# File cache

A modern file-based cache implementation written in Go.

Inspired by [gokyle/filecache](https://github.com/gokyle/filecache).

## Install

```shell
# Requires Go 1.18 or later
 $ go get -u github.com/0xc000022070/filecache@latest
```
